column4: hello! I want to play an matroska video (.mkv) but it can't be played by vlc nur any other media player. the codec is h264
a properly installed mplayer plays pretty much anything I've ever thrown at it. Wanna try that next...?
ok i will try. do i have to compile it or should it work to simply install it?
simply install it. Especially, look for the additional codec packages.
